sentences.en: But he warned of a barrier to mobile phone take-up that is felt keenly in villages.
sentences.cn: 但他警告那些手机用户，他敏锐地感觉到在农村里这是一个极大的障碍。

sentences.en: He felt keenly that the banker ought to be shaken out.
sentences.cn: 他深以为这位银行家必须排挤出去.

sentences.en: He is keenly interested in classical English literature.
He observes keenly but says very little.
sentences.cn: 他观察敏锐,却很少发言.

sentences.en: He remained keenly alive to the dangers.
sentences.cn: 他依然对各种危险十分敏感.

sentences.en: I feel keenly that my ability falls short of my wishes.
It was on Sunday that Turgie felt his loneliness most keenly.
sentences.cn: 星期天是特基感到最孤单的时候.

sentences.en: Peace again! – The exquisite hour before dawn, here at my old desk — seldom have I realized so keenly, appreciated so fully, these still, dark hours.
sentences.cn: 又是安静!黎明前的美妙的时间，就在我的旧书桌前——我从未如此敏锐地认识，如此心怀感激，这些仍旧黑暗的时间。

sentences.en: She felt his indifference keenly and longed to see Hurstwood.
sentences.cn: 她深切感到他对她不关心,因此渴望见到赫斯渥.

sentences.en: She remained keenly interested in international affairs.
sentences.cn: 她仍旧对国际事务很感兴趣。

sentences.en: The contest should be very keenly fought.
sentences.cn: 比赛将会争夺得非常激烈。

sentences.en: The shops also offer a keenly priced curtain-making service.
sentences.cn: 这些商店也提供价格优惠的窗帘制作服务。

sentences.en: Then the islanders had to watch the ice keenly.
sentences.cn: 那时节,岛上的人们警觉地注视着冰块.

sentences.en: There was a note in her voice which vibrated keenly.
sentences.cn: 她说话的口气在他脑中敲响了警钟.

sentences.en: They're keenly aware that whatever they decide will set a precedent.
sentences.cn: 他们深知无论他们的决定是什么，都将开创先例。

words.tran_cn: 敏锐的，敏捷的；渴望的；强烈的；热心的；锐利的

trans.tran_cn: 敏锐地，敏感地，锐利地，强烈地
